name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EasyFill - The easiest form filler ever.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy fill forms with EasyFill. The simplest and easiest form filler ever.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Once installed, register and log in to your account to use it for free.

Once you have added your information, hold down the Ctrl key and click on the input field to start using it.

It works on all versions of Chrome.


———————————————————————中文—————————————————————————
这是一个表单填充插件，可让你免去繁琐的重复性输入。
在插件中录入内容后，页面上按Ctrl+鼠标单击即可调用内容列表。
